Package com.g1.mychess.player.repository

Interface FollowRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Follow,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Follow,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Follow,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Follow,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Follow,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Follow>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Follow,Long>
public interface FollowRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Follow,Long>
Repository interface for managing Follow entities. Provides methods to query and interact with player follow relationships in the database.

    Retrieves a paginated list of Follow entries where the given player is the follower.

    Retrieves a Follow entry for a specific follower and followed player.

  • Method Details

    • findByFollower

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Follow> findByFollower(Player follower, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of Follow entries where the given player is the follower.
      Parameters:
      follower - the player who is following others.
      pageable - the pagination information (page number, page size, etc.).
      Returns:
      a Page containing Follow entries where the given player is the follower.

    • findByFollowed

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Follow> findByFollowed(Player followed, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of Follow entries where the given player is the followed.
      Parameters:
      followed - the player being followed by others.
      pageable - the pagination information (page number, page size, etc.).
      Returns:
      a Page containing Follow entries where the given player is the followed.

    • findByFollowerAndFollowed

      Optional<Follow> findByFollowerAndFollowed(Player follower, Player followed)
      Retrieves a Follow entry for a specific follower and followed player.
      Parameters:
      follower - the player who is following.
      followed - the player who is being followed.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Follow entry if it exists, or empty if not found.
